three loops remain on hook* repeat from * to * until 5 loops remain on hook yo and pull through all loops on hook yo again and pull through to close the stitch the bobble may try to pop inside the work if so make sure to pop it back out so that it sits on the outside of the work pattern start hands and arms make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from hand to shoulder use a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st work 6sc 6sts round 2 work 2sc in each st around 12sts rnds 3 & 4 single_crochet in each st around 12sts round 5 work a 4dc bobble see special stitches in the first st makes thumb single_crochet in each of the remaining 11sts 12sts round 6 single_crochet in each st around 12sts round 7 single_crochet in each of the first 4sts decrease single_crochet into each of the next 4sts decrease 10sts stuff hand firmly and the arm lighter and lighter towards the top there should be almost no stuffing at the top this makes the arm sit at the side of the body and makes the doll easier to dress round 8 single_crochet in each of the next 3sts decrease single_crochet into each of the next 3sts decrease 8sts rnds 9 - 17 single_crochet in each st around 8sts now we will close up the arm ready to crochet onto the body later row 18 slip_stitch across until you reach the side of the arm ch1 and now with the loop on the right-hand side as pictured single_crochet across working through both stitches 4 loops on either side as pictured 4sts fasten_off and hide loose ends arms will be crocheted on to the body in round 41 foot leg & start of optional underwear make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from the foot up you will need a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts move the marker up to the first stitch of the next round after finishing the previous one round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st work 6sc 6sts round 2 work 2sc in each st around 12sts round 3 single_crochet in first st 2sc in second st *single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st repeat from * around 18sts round 4 single_crochet in the back loop of each st around 18sts rnds 5-7 single_crochet in each st around 18sts round 8 single_crochet in each of the first 6sts decrease x3 single_crochet in each of
